bibdata.title: American National Standard for Radiation Protection Instrumentation Test and Calibration
Air Monitoring Instruments
American National Standard for Radiation Protection Instrumentation Test and Calibration - Air Monitoring Instruments

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Test and calibration requirements for air monitoring instruments used for the detection and measurement of airborne radioactive substances are established.
Test and calibration requirements for air monitoring instruments used for the detection and measurement of airborne radioactive substances are established.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
